TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PrintSystemObjectPropertiesChangedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs implements class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: 作成する必要があります PropertiesChanged イベントのデータを提供します。

remarks.format:
## 解説
> [!CAUTION] > クラス内で、 <xref:System.Printing> Windows サービスや ASP.NET アプリケーションまたはサービス内で使用する名前空間はサポートされていません。 これらのアプリケーションの種類のいずれかの内側からこれらのクラスを使用しようと、予期しない問題が発生する可能性があります、低下しているなどのサービスのパフォーマンスと実行時の例外です。
Windows フォーム アプリケーションから印刷するを参照して、 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> 名前空間。
## 例

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

Docs.summary: この オブジェクトによって使用されているすべてのリソースを解放します。

remarks.format:
## 解説 Call <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemObjectPropertiesChangedEventArgs.Dispose> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemObjectPropertiesChangedEventArgs>. The <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemObjectPropertiesChangedEventArgs.Dispose> method leaves the <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemObjectPropertiesChangedEventArgs> in an unusable state. After calling <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemObjectPropertiesChangedEventArgs.Dispose>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemObjectPropertiesChangedEventArgs> so that the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemObjectPropertiesChangedEventArgs> was occupying. For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](http://msdn.microsoft.com/ja-jp/a17b0066-71c2-4ba4-9822-8e19332fc213) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/ja-jp/eb4e1af0-3b48-4fbc-ad4e-fc2f64138bf9).
> [!NOTE] > Always call <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemObjectPropertiesChangedEventArgs.Dispose> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemObjectPropertiesChangedEventArgs>. Otherwise, the resources it is using are not freed until the garbage collector calls the **languageKeyword tag is not supported!!!!** > method of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemObjectPropertiesChangedEventArgs> object.
## 例

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool A_0) cil managed

Docs.summary: オブジェクトによって使用されているアンマネージ リソースを解放します。オプションでマネージ リソースも解放できます。

remarks.format:
## 解説 This method is called by the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method. **languageKeyword tag is not supported!!!!** invokes the protected **languageKeyword tag is not supported!!!!** method with the unnamed Boolean parameter set to **languageKeyword tag is not supported!!!!** . <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes **languageKeyword tag is not supported!!!!** with the parameter set to **languageKeyword tag is not supported!!!!** .
When the Boolean parameter is **languageKeyword tag is not supported!!!!** , this method releases all resources that are held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemObjectPropertiesChangedEventArgs> references. This method invokes the **languageKeyword tag is not supported!!!!** method of each referenced object.
## 例

block.para:
can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that were previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
